TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Marorok, title = Marorok, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marorok} }

S.FORM: alang Marorok ga niya mki sku Karing Keng atu Hamicho go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 267 buwan, 708 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 46% kyan ku 328 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 54% kyan ku 380 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Amis 38%, Paywan 2%, Bunun 3%, Truku 2%, binah lihuyan s'uli 1%. maki qu ngasal bziran, ngasal psatu tegami ru pqniqan iyu. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Marorok hya' ga llyung. tay 'zil na Marorok hya' ga rgyax. tay mkyahu' na Marorok hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Marorok hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na Marorok hya' ga Ukang. tay 'llaw na Marorok hya' ga Olalip. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Marorok ga niya mki sko Karing Keng ato Hamicho go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 267 bowan, 708 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 46% kyan ko 328 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 54% kyan ko 380 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Amis 38%, Paywan 2%, Bonon 3%, Troko 2%, binah lihoyan s'oli 1%. maki qo ngasal bziran, ngasal psato tegami ro pqniqan iyo. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Marorok hya' ga llyong. tay 'zil na Marorok hya' ga rgyax. tay mkyaho' na Marorok hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Marorok hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na Marorok hya' ga Ukang. tay 'llaw na Marorok hya' ga Olalip. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
